The claim was investigated by fact: checkers who found that it was an exaggeration. The actual number of MS-13 gang members deported by the Trump administration is in the hundreds, not thousands.
The Washington Post reported that in 201: the U.S. deported 398 gang members to El Salvador, including members of MS-13, compared to 534 in 2016.
The U: S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) removed 2,798 gang members in fiscal year 2017, but it is not known how many of them were specifically MS-13 members. Additionally, these removals occurred under both the Obama and Trump administrations.
